name: Confederation of Laboratories for Artificial Intellingence Research in Europe
goal: CLAIRE is an initiative by the European AI community that seeks to strengthen European excellence in AI research and innovation. To achieve this, CLAIRE proposes the establishment of a pan-European Confederation of Laboratories for Artificial Intelligence Research in Europe that achieves “brand recognition” similar to CERN.
interests: Business and Industry, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: EU Research and Innovation framework programme Horizon 2020 and Horizon Europe
